tool_description: Check how strong your password is and if it is already disclosed. Generate your strong password
name: Password Checker
title: Password Checker

api_list.name: evaluate
api_list.description: Evaluate how strong your password is. You will get a score that us between 0-4, higher is the score higher is the complexity of you password. You will also get an indication on how much time it will take to hack your password.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://password-checker.p.rapidapi.com/password/evaluate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://password-checker.p.rapidapi.com/password/evaluate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "password-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
